component.name: GridScreenItem
component.script:
function itemContentChanged() as void itemData = m.top.itemContent m.itemImage.loadDisplayMode = "scaleToFit"
if itemData.usePoster m.itemImage.loadWidth = 147 m.itemImage.loadHeight = 262 if itemData.posterThumbnail <> invalid AND itemData.posterThumbnail <> "" m.itemImage.uri = itemData.posterThumbnail else m.itemImage.uri = itemData.HDPOSTERURL end if else m.itemImage.loadWidth = 262 m.itemImage.loadHeight = 147 m.itemImage.uri = itemData.HDPOSTERURL end if
offset = m.itemImage.loadwidth - 32 - 5 m.statusImage.translation = [offset, 5] m.statusImage.visible = false
if(itemData.ContentType = 4 AND itemData.SubscriptionRequired = true AND m.global.enable_lock_icons = true) m.statusImage.visible = true
if m.global.auth.nativeSubCount > 0 OR m.global.auth.universalSubCount > 0 m.statusImage.uri = "pkg:/images/iconUnlocked.png" else m.statusImage.uri = "pkg:/images/iconLocked.png" end if end if end function
function init() as void m.itemImage = m.top.findNode("itemImage") m.statusImage = m.top.findNode("statusImage") end function
